Name: Zen Vs Gravity
About the game: Zen Vs Gravity This is a poetic shooter .. test your skills and create epic music thru your gameplay. You have a RailGun, a band and a full choir at your disposition. Each cubes makes a sound or a voice when destroyed .. Can you shoot them all ? With style and musicality ? Can you survive across 20 procedural levels that never play the same ? Can you get a 5 stars rating and show the galactic council that you are one of the best shooter in the galaxy ? Get Galactic rewards, solve Galactic riddle, get sucked into another dimension and fight for your life ! No loading screens guaranteed ! Are you ready to create your first Galactic Opera ? The Game is on !!
